00220 inline uint32
00221 MultiFileDBufRequester::getFileSize( int index ) 
00222 {
00223    uint32 size = m_dataFiles[ index ]->getFileSize();
00224    for ( int i = 0; i < m_nbrHash; ++i ) {
00225       size += m_indexFiles[ index * m_nbrHash + i ]->getFileSize();
00226    }
00227    return size;
00228 }
